name: digitalservice.github.io
description: Simple page to show the projects of digitalservice at a glance

scripts.build: JEKYLL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config.dev.yml
scripts.build:production: JEKYLL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml
scripts.build:opencode: JEKYLL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config.opencode.yml

author: Christian Kaatz<christian.kaatz@digitalservice.bund.de>
